title: Travelling in Singapore
creator_credit: Tony Chenn, Alex Creshi and Australia. Special Broadcasting Service
brief_description: With a population of 2.5 million, this former British colony is renowned as the cleanest place in Asia. Famous for its international hotel, Raffles, it’s large harbour and its shopping, Singapore is full of life.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Chenn, Alex Creshi and Australia. Special Broadcasting Service
